page.title: 07MONEYLENDERS
page.content: When Jean asked for more time to pay, the moneylender turned nasty. He took her Child Benefit Book from her and threatened to send in the Bailiffs. In the end Jean and Colin had to sell their television, music centre and Jean's engagement ring to pay off their debt. {It is against the law for moneylenders {to call at a house uninvited.} Most of them do not have a licence from the Office of Fair Trading, which is also a criminal offence. Many moneylenders harrass or threaten people who cannot keep up repayments, and that too is an offence. Anyone with debt problems should contact their Citizens Advice Bureau.
